com.gemalto.idp.mobile.otp.provisioning

Class ClearTextSecretTokenConfigurationBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gemalto.idp.mobile.otp.provisioning.ClearTextSecretTokenConfigurationBuilder

extends java.lang.Object
    Builder for ClearTextSeedImport configuration
    Since:
    4.0

    • Constructor Detail

      • ClearTextSecretTokenConfigurationBuilder

        public ClearTextSecretTokenConfigurationBuilder(PinAuthInput pin,
                                                SecureByteArray secret,
                                                boolean wipePinAndSecret)
        Parameters:
        pin - The pin to be used for wrapping the secret. The value stored in this array will be wiped by the constructor if wipePinAndSecret is set to YES.
        secret - The clear text secret seed or key to be provisioned in the SDK. The value stored in this array will be wiped by the constructor if wipePinAndSecret is set to YES.
        wipePinAndSecret - Set YES to let the constructor wipe the pin and secret after usage.

    • Method Detail

      • setUserTokenId

        public ClearTextSecretTokenConfigurationBuilder setUserTokenId(int userTokenId)
        Set userTokenId
        Parameters:
        userTokenId - An unsigned value ranging from 0x00 to 0xFF (i.e. 0 to 255). If no value exists, it is suggested to provide -1. It is part of the credential needed during provisioning. It must be guaranteed by the external token creation process that two tokens for the same end-user (on authentication server) and from the same domain will never have the same UTI.
        Returns:
        ClearTextSecretTokenConfigurationBuilder

      • setTokenSequenceNumber

        public ClearTextSecretTokenConfigurationBuilder setTokenSequenceNumber(int tokenSequenceNumber)
        Set tokenSequenceNumber
        Parameters:
        tokenSequenceNumber - The token sequence number that distinguishes this token among others the users have. This value is defined only for CAP tokens and therefore is not used for now.
        Returns:
        ClearTextSecretTokenConfigurationBuilder

      • build

        public ProvisioningConfiguration build()
        Returns:
        ProvisioningConfiguration object.
